name: Dust Bunny House
description:
PROTECT YOUR HOME FROM ANGRY OBJECTS

You are just an everyday dust bunny trying to make it in this cruel world. Household items like boxes and chairs want to bring you down by pummeling your dust bunny home into dust. You choose to use the healing power of nature to combat their onslaughts.

CONTROLS:

Point and click your mouse to move around the map. To use the items you collect along the way, use the buttons that appear on the left side of your screen. Buttons will only appear when you have an item available in your inventory. 

BUTTONS TURN BRIGHTLY COLORED WHEN ACTIVE. THEY ARE A LITTLE BUGGY.

When a button is active, click on the map to plant/heal.  Click a button a second time to cancel placement. If it doesn't work, keep clicking! Hover over plants to see how much health they have remaining.

GAME PHASES:

Each game phase ends automatically when the timer in the upper left corner of the screen expires.

MORNING

Gather seeds and plant them around your house for protection! Different seeds provide different kinds of defense. Also, try to gather some water! You can use water to heal your plants and your home once they receive damage. 

EVENING

See if your house survives an onslaught of attacks. Attacks come from all directions, so be prepared. If your house gets hit, it will knock the attacker back, but it won't do any damage. Get through the evening by protecting your house until the timer runs out or incapacitating all enemies.

ITEMS:

Flying Seeds / Plants:  These plants shoot seeds in all 4 directions. Hitting an emey with a seed incapacitates it.

Force Seeds / Plants:  These plants slow enemies down. Use them to help slow down fast-moving chairs, making them easier targets for seeds.

Water:   Use this to heal your plants / home (yep, your HOME) (+ 5 HP per drop).
